## WorkspaceSvg.getScale() method

Get the workspace's zoom factor. If the workspace has a parent, we call into the parent to get the workspace scale.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getScale(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

The workspace zoom factor. Units: (pixels / workspaceUnit).
